item.title: BlackRock Hits Record $12.5 Trillion Despite Tariff Turmoil
item.description: BlackRock Inc. pulled in $46 billion to its investment funds, and assets hit a record of $12.5 trillion as clients rode out the volatility of President Donald Trump’s tariff policies in the second qua
